name: sdbg
description: This project is designed to **recut** larger GIFs into multiple smaller **animated** GIFs sized for Elgatoâ€™s Stream Deck models, including **Stream Deck Mini**, **Stream Deck**, **Stream Deck Plus**, **Stream Deck Neo** and **Stream Deck XL**. It also supports a real **drag & drop** area for convenient file selection and automatically zips the sliced GIF tiles for easy download.

scripts.vercel-build: mkdir -p api && curl -L https://github.com/kohler/gifsicle/releases/download/v1.95/gifsicle-1.95-linux64.tar.gz | tar -xz --strip-components=1 -C api/ gifsicle-1.95/src/gifsicle && chmod +x api/gifsicle
